title: Atelier Tycoon - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Otome Game   Transmigration
author: 사글세
description:
Manon likes to play the simulation game for young girls ' Atelier Tycoon ' so when she finds herself in the game she knows that she just has to follow the path of the protagonist.

However, the more she advances, the more characters, even extras, come closer to her.

Will she be able to return to her home world or will there always be new goals?>
